target_name: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination
computation_definitions:
Estimated data by international organizations (Type2)
This is Korean data prepared by international organizations through estimation and modeling.
If there are no national data corresponding to UN SDGs indicators, international data are available for monitoring.
indicator_name: Mortality rate attributed to household and ambient air pollution
indicator_definition: Age-standardized mortality rate attributed to household and ambient air pollution per 100,000 population
computation_calculations: Estimated based on data on the proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels, annual mean levels of fine particulate matter, risk of exposure to air pollution, and deaths attributed to diseases, etc.
